rules.description: CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)
Toggle CAPS_LOCK by pressing LEFT_SHIFT followed by RIGHT_SHIFT (or, vice-versa)
Finder > Use Hyper + L/H as Open/Back
Finder > Use Hyper + V for Cut and Paste
Chrome/Safari/Finder/VSCode > Use Hyper + =/- to navigate open tabs
Chrome/Safari/Finder > Use Hyper + T to open new tab
Chrome/Safari > Use cmd + ` to reopen last closed browser tab
Preview > Use A/G/T for Toggle Markup Toolbar/Highlight/Text
Hyper + '/ENTER == Place cursor at beginning/end of line (+fwd/bk in browser history)
Screenshot key (Keychron) saves selected/full screen as file
Numeric Keypad Trigger [Tab as trigger key]
